headline: Schools Spend Millions on a Safety Measure to Stop Bullets. It Doesn’t Work.
summary: Demonstrations by dealers selling window film to keep out armed attackers often mislead officials into thinking it is a bullet-resistant shield.

raw.headline: Schools Spend Millions on a Safety Measure to Stop Bullets. It Doesn’t Work.
